name: You Just Water Flowers, Apparently.
description:
One of the legendary star adolescents, is saving the moon from the earth! But, that isn't you. You are a moon gardener, and you just water flowers, apparently. That's it.

Really.

Controls And Stuff

G - Start/Stop Watering

And you need to go to the spring to refill your water

Most things are flowers, when they talk you know they have been watered enough.

Music from https://filmmusic.io:
"Twisting " by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
